meanings.definition: The loss of one or more sounds or letters at the beginning of a word.
meanings.sent1: Aphaeresis can change the way a word sounds.
meanings.sent2: In aphaeresis, letters are dropped from the start of a word.
meanings.sent4: Her aphaeresis of emotions made her seem distant.
meanings.sent5: The aphaeresis of the first note created a haunting melody.

meanings.definition: The process of removing a letter or letters from the beginning of a word.
meanings.sent1: During aphaeresis, a letter is taken away from the start of a word.
meanings.sent2: Aphaeresis is a common practice in linguistics.
meanings.sent4: His aphaeresis of responsibilities led to chaos.
meanings.sent5: The aphaeresis of the first word set the tone for the entire story.
